short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that simplifies YouTube's layout for maximum focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Simplified is a browser extension designed to keep you focused and productive while watching videos on YouTube.

Features:
- Ability to hide the search bar
- Ability to hide recommended videos (Everything from the home page to video end screen recommendations)
- Ability to hide the left sidebar
- Ability to hide profile and notifications
- Ability to hide comments

This is an open-source project and all contributions are welcome at https://github.com/Bsodoge/YouTube-Simplified
